commands.fogger.use.failed.fogpackDoesNo: The Fogpack "%s" cannot be loaded or does not exist. If you have imported them, you need to reload with /fogger reload
commands.fogger.generate.failed.fogpackA: A Fogpack with the identifier "%s" already exists. Please, try another one.
commands.fogger.generate.failed.notAllow: The namespace "%s" is not free-use. Please, try another one.
commands.fogger.generate.success.fogpack: %s was generated at your Fogpacks folder.
Click here to open Fogpacks folder.
commands.fogger.reload.success: All Fogpacks have been reloaded and updated.
commands.fogger.info.title: %s • %s
